attributes.action: Reinstate the word Easter before Egg Hunt
attributes.background: Please instruct the National Trust and Cadburys to reinstate the word Easter before Egg Hunt.  Its removal is an affront to our national cultural heritage.  Easter is the name UK citizens give to our celebration of the return of Spring.

rejection.details: The name of the Egg Hunt is a matter for the National Trust and Cadburys, not the UK Government or Parliament.
